title: Budapest
lyrics:
My house in Budapest
My hidden treasure chest,
Golden grand piano
My beautiful Castillo
You

You

I'd leave it all



My acres of a land

I have achieved

It may be hard for you to,

Stop and believe



But for you

You

I'd Leave it all

For you

You

I'd Leave it all



Give me one good reason

Why I should never make a change

And baby if you hold me

Then all of this will go away



My many artifacts

The list goes on

If you just say the words

I'll up and run



Oh, to you

You

I'd leave it all

Oh, to you

You

I'd leave it all



Give me one good reason

Why I should never make a change

And baby if you hold me

Then all of this will go away



Give me one good reason

Why I should never make a change

And baby if you hold me

Then all of this will go away



My friends and family

They, don't understand

They fear they'd lose so much

If, you took my hand



But, for you

You,

I'd lose it all

Oh for you

You,

I'd lose it all



Give me one good reason

Why I should never make a change

And baby if you hold me

Then all of this will go away



Give me one good reason

Why I should never make a change

And baby if you hold me

Then all of this will go away



My house in Budapest

My hidden treasure chest,

Golden grand piano

My beautiful Castillo



You

You

I'd leave it all

Oh for you

You

I'd leave it all
